info.name: CRM
info.description:
Welcome to the CRM API.

Contact Support:
 Email: admin@newcrm.com

header.description: (Required) ID of the consumer which you want to get or push data from
(Required) The ID of your Unify application

Provide the service id you want to call (e.g., pipedrive). [See the full list in the connector section.](#section/Connectors) Only needed when a consumer has activated multiple integrations for a Unified API.

query.description: Include raw response. Mostly used for debugging purposes

variable.description: (Required) ID of the record you are acting upon.
